meanings.definition: the fruit of various cacti, typically with bright-colored skin and sweet, juicy flesh.
meanings.sent1: The pitayas at the market looked so colorful and delicious.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating pitayas because they are sweet and juicy.
meanings.sent3: When the pitayas started singing, everyone was surprised!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the skin of a pitaya.
meanings.sent5: The pitayas burst with flavor in my mouth.

meanings.definition: a type of cactus native to Mexico and Central America, also known as dragon fruit.
meanings.sent1: The pitayas in the garden are thriving in the warm climate.
meanings.sent2: Have you ever tasted the delicious pitayas from Mexico?
meanings.sent3: The pitayas in the desert were wearing tiny sombreros.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were as exotic as a pitaya in the Arctic.
meanings.sent5: The pitayas bloomed beautifully under the sun.
